arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat Effect Chance}|%|]{/c}
{/if}Throw a massive ethereal scythe that deals {c_number}{payload:IMPACT_DAMAGE}{/c} damage.

{c_important}Desecrated Ground{/c} seeps from the scythe, dealing {c_number}{payload:DAMAGE_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage over {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Dread Scythe{/c}'s impact Stuns enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:IMPACT_STUN}{/c} seconds.

You periodically cast {c_important}Sever{/c} or {c_important}Blight{/c} at a random Nearby enemy during {c_important}Dread Scythe's{/c} duration, dealing {c_number}[SF_15 * 100|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
You periodically cast a random equipped {c_important}Corpse{/c} Skill on a Corpse in {c_important}Dread Scythe's{/c} area during its duration, dealing {c_number}[SF_14 * 100|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
Enemies killed in {c_important}Dread Scythe's{/c} area have a {c_number}[SF_13 * 100|%|]{/c} chance to leave behind a {c_important}{u}Blood Orb{/u}{/c}.
